i).text:
Configuration for https://turbowarp.org/
You can move, resize, and minimize this comment, but don't edit it by hand. This comment can be deleted to remove the stored settings.
{"framerate":60} // _twconfig_

ff.text: Init starts the main loop for the main menu

e).text: Init is a script, to make the transition from pressing green flag to the main game smoother. It acts as a sort of Splash Screen.

e;.text:
This isn't relevant for anyone, that doesn't make changes to the project, it just resets all visual values to loading state.
TLTR: RESETS TO FACTORY SETTINGS

i+.text:
Changelog:

-Added new custom functions in the GUI Layer
-Refined some variable names for readability
-Added features from /DEV Branch
-Added degauss effect after a scan is completed
-Added Delta time implimentation. The Project can now properly run in 60FPS mode on Turbowarp

i..text: Just for debugging and messing around...

i/.text: All of those blocks are for movement.

fO.text: This plays the random pitch walking sound effect

i;.text:
Info:      
This Sprite acts as a positioning helper for the Scan Raycaster.

mutation.proccode: Degauss in %s frames with wobble strenght of %s , index %s
Degauss in %s frames with wobble strenght of %s , index %s

ho.text: CRT inspired animation to play after each scan

i@.text:
Info:      
This is the main level sprite. Change this sprite, and the geometry of the rendered map changes.

i`.text: Functions to execute assinged out of menu_register List.

iB.text: Script to automate all the things to do for clone generations

iT.text: For correct animation speed, these blocks are crutial. Otherwise, the animation would play faster / slower on different systems.

iH.text: Add menu functions into the list for your coresponding sprite number, that you want to use as a button!
